name: Final Glider
description:
Final Glider is an arcade endless shooter with two playable ships each with unique weapons and abilities. 

Upgrade you ships and challenge you and your friends high-scores as you fight endless swarms of enemy drones.

---------------------------------------Controls---------------------------------------

 -------Ship Movement-------

'W' 'A' 'S' 'D' 

or 

Left Controller Stick

-------Ship Weapons / Abilities-------

'O' 'P' 

or

mouse buttons 

or

Controller triggers 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- This Game Supports -

Keyboard + Mouse,

Keyboard only,

and Controller Play
